mapper.insert: insert into APV(APV_SQ, APV_FORM_SQ, APV_OK_SQ, EMP_SQ, APV_SAVE, APV_CTT, APV_FL_RT, APV_FL_NM, EMP_1ST_SQ, EMP_2ND_SQ, EMP_FNL_SQ, APV_NO, APV_DATE, APV_WRITE_DATE, APV_TITLE) values( #{apv_sq}, #{apv_form_sq}, 0, #{emp_sq}, 1, #{apv_ctt}, "", "", #{emp_1st_sq}, #{emp_2nd_sq}, #{emp_fnl_sq}, "", #{apv_date}, sysdate, #{apv_title})
